trends: There has been one other sighting in Hawthorne
There were no other sightings in Hawthorne on or around January 23rd 2013
divs: Sighting Details1. This is not the first time I've seen the ufo in daylight on my way home from work ( driving ) in this same area. I've seen about five sightings. Surely there were other witnesses but it seems no one is saying anything. 2. what made it noticeable was that it can easily catch someone eye as it is abnormal to see a UFO stationary hovering and at the same time , very reflective metallic object as it seems. 3. A UFO , because these sightings are becoming more common. 4. Silver'ish , very reflective , stationary in the sky , ascended slightly , but mainly stationary. 5. My first reaction was ( i wish i had a high powered camera so i can zoom in on it and take clear pictures ) 6. I lost sight of the object , by it just vanishing in thin air. As it did the other times.
Summary: I was on the rt 208 on the way home from work when the stationary ufo apppeared
